name: GetAllTemplates
description:
Retrieve all templates from a Pagerduty account.

This tool retrieves a list of all the templates available in a Pagerduty account. It should be called when you need to access or manage template information in the account. Scoped OAuth with `templates.read` is required.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page. Use to control pagination.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset index to start pagination in search results. This is used to navigate through paginated results efficiently.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: template_search_query
parameters.description: Template name or description to search within the account's templates.

value_schema.description: Template name or description to search

parameters.name: filter_by_template_type
parameters.description: Filters the templates by their type. Provide the type of template you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: sort_templates_by
parameters.description: Specifies the field and direction to sort results, such as 'name' or 'created_at'. Defaults to ascending order if not specified.

value_schema.description: Used to specify both the field you wish to sort the results on (name/created_at), as well as the direction (asc/desc) of the results. The sort_by field and direction should be separated by a colon. Sort direction defaults to ascending.

parameters.name: include_total_in_pagination
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total field in pagination responses for detailed counts.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Template name or description to search

value_schema.description: Template name or description to search

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Used to specify both the field you wish to sort the results on (name/created_at), as well as the direction (asc/desc) of the results. The sort_by field and direction should be separated by a colon. Sort direction defaults to ascending.

value_schema.description: Used to specify both the field you wish to sort the results on (name/created_at), as well as the direction (asc/desc) of the results. The sort_by field and direction should be separated by a colon. Sort direction defaults to ascending.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
